title: Personalized Language Instruction Design Utilizing Digital Learning Data

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A process for pre-service/in-service teachers to learn collecting/analyzing digital learning data in language education settings and applying it to instructional design, using smartphone-based simple data analysis tools

learning_goals: Learners can interpret learning data collected via platforms (e.g., Google Classroom) and apply it to educational decision-making.
Learners can design personalized instructional strategies based on diagnostic data of individual language proficiency.
Learners can explain the process of analyzing formative assessment results to implement real-time classroom improvements.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
